sqlMap.select: select ORDER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, ORDER_SMALLTYPE, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_AMOUNT, PAYER_NAME, PAYER_LOGINNAME, PAYER_MEMBERCODE, PAYER_MEMBERTYPE, PAYER_ACCTCODE, PAYER_ACCTTYPE, PAYEE_NAME, PAYEE_LOGINNAME, PAYEE_MEMBERCODE, PAYEE_MEMBERTYPE, PAYEE_ACCTCODE, PAYEE_ACCTTYPE, PAYMENT_REASON, FAILED_REASON, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, TRADE_ALIAS, TRADE_TYPE, FOREIGN_ORDERID, PARENT_ORDERID from FO.PAY_TOACCTORDER where ORDER_ID = #orderId:DECIMAL#

select ORDER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, ORDER_SMALLTYPE, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_AMOUNT, PAYER_NAME, PAYER_LOGINNAME, PAYER_MEMBERCODE, PAYER_MEMBERTYPE, PAYER_ACCTCODE, PAYER_ACCTTYPE, PAYEE_NAME, PAYEE_LOGINNAME, PAYEE_MEMBERCODE, PAYEE_MEMBERTYPE, PAYEE_ACCTCODE, PAYEE_ACCTTYPE, PAYMENT_REASON, FAILED_REASON, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, TRADE_ALIAS, TRADE_TYPE, FOREIGN_ORDERID, PARENT_ORDERID from FO.PAY_TOACCTORDER
order by $orderByClause$
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT 200 || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yymmddhh24mi') || LPAD(SEQ_FO_GLOBE_CYCLE.nextval, 6, 0) AS ID FROM DUAL
insert into FO.PAY_TOACCTORDER (ORDER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, ORDER_SMALLTYPE, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_AMOUNT, PAYER_NAME, PAYER_LOGINNAME, PAYER_MEMBERCODE, PAYER_MEMBERTYPE, PAYER_ACCTCODE, PAYER_ACCTTYPE, PAYEE_NAME, PAYEE_LOGINNAME, PAYEE_MEMBERCODE, PAYEE_MEMBERTYPE, PAYEE_ACCTCODE, PAYEE_ACCTTYPE, PAYMENT_REASON, FAILED_REASON, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, TRADE_ALIAS, TRADE_TYPE, FOREIGN_ORDERID, PARENT_ORDERID,PAYER_FEE) values (#orderId:DECIMAL#, #orderType:DECIMAL#, #orderSmallType:VARCHAR#, #orderStatus:DECIMAL#, #orderAmount:DECIMAL#, #payerName:VARCHAR#, #payerLoginName:VARCHAR#, #payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#, #payerMemberType:DECIMAL#, #payerAcctCode:VARCHAR#, #payerAcctType:DECIMAL#, #payeeName:VARCHAR#, #payeeLoginName:VARCHAR#, #payeeMemberCode:DECIMAL#, #payeeMemberType:DECIMAL#, #payeeAcctCode:VARCHAR#, #payeeAcctType:DECIMAL#, #paymentReason:VARCHAR#, #failedReason:VARCHAR#, #createDate:TIMESTAMP#, #updateDate:TIMESTAMP#, #tradeAlias:VARCHAR#, #tradeType:DECIMAL#, #foreignOrderId:VARCHAR#, #parentOrderId:DECIMAL#,#payerFee:DECIMAL#)
sqlMap.update: update FO.PAY_TOACCTORDER set ORDER_TYPE = #orderType:DECIMAL#, ORDER_SMALLTYPE = #orderSmallType:VARCHAR#, ORDER_STATUS = #orderStatus:DECIMAL#, ORDER_AMOUNT = #orderAmount:DECIMAL#, PAYER_NAME = #payerName:VARCHAR#, PAYER_LOGINNAME = #payerLoginName:VARCHAR#, PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#, PAYER_MEMBERTYPE = #payerMemberType:DECIMAL#, PAYER_ACCTCODE = #payerAcctCode:VARCHAR#, PAYER_ACCTTYPE = #payerAcctType:DECIMAL#, PAYEE_NAME = #payeeName:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_LOGINNAME = #payeeLoginName:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_MEMBERCODE = #payeeMemberCode:DECIMAL#, PAYEE_MEMBERTYPE = #payeeMemberType:DECIMAL#, PAYEE_ACCTCODE = #payeeAcctCode:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_ACCTTYPE = #payeeAcctType:DECIMAL#, PAYMENT_REASON = #paymentReason:VARCHAR#, FAILED_REASON = #failedReason:VARCHAR#, CREATE_DATE = #createDate:TIMESTAMP#, UPDATE_DATE = #updateDate:TIMESTAMP#, TRADE_ALIAS = #tradeAlias:VARCHAR#, TRADE_TYPE = #tradeType:DECIMAL#, FOREIGN_ORDERID = #foreignOrderId:VARCHAR#, PARENT_ORDERID = #parentOrderId:DECIMAL# where ORDER_ID = #orderId:DECIMAL#

update FO.PAY_TOACCTORDER
ORDER_TYPE = #orderType:DECIMAL#
ORDER_SMALLTYPE = #orderSmallType:VARCHAR#
ORDER_STATUS = #orderStatus:DECIMAL#
ORDER_AMOUNT = #orderAmount:DECIMAL#
PAYER_NAME = #payerName:VARCHAR#
PAYER_LOGINNAME = #payerLoginName:VARCHAR#
PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#
PAYER_MEMBERTYPE = #payerMemberType:DECIMAL#
PAYER_ACCTCODE = #payerAcctCode:VARCHAR#
PAYER_ACCTTYPE = #payerAcctType:DECIMAL#
PAYEE_NAME = #payeeName:VARCHAR#
PAYEE_LOGINNAME = #payeeLoginName:VARCHAR#
PAYEE_MEMBERCODE = #payeeMemberCode:DECIMAL#
PAYEE_MEMBERTYPE = #payeeMemberType:DECIMAL#
PAYEE_ACCTCODE = #payeeAcctCode:VARCHAR#
PAYEE_ACCTTYPE = #payeeAcctType:DECIMAL#
PAYMENT_REASON = #paymentReason:VARCHAR#
FAILED_REASON = #failedReason:VARCHAR#
CREATE_DATE = #createDate:TIMESTAMP#
UPDATE_DATE = #updateDate:TIMESTAMP#
TRADE_ALIAS = #tradeAlias:VARCHAR#
TRADE_TYPE = #tradeType:DECIMAL#
FOREIGN_ORDERID = #foreignOrderId:VARCHAR#
PARENT_ORDERID = #parentOrderId:DECIMAL#
where ORDER_ID = #orderId:DECIMAL#

update FO.PAY_TOACCTORDER
ORDER_ID = #record.orderId:DECIMAL#
ORDER_TYPE = #record.orderType:DECIMAL#
ORDER_SMALLTYPE = #record.orderSmallType:VARCHAR#
ORDER_STATUS = #record.orderStatus:DECIMAL#
ORDER_AMOUNT = #record.orderAmount:DECIMAL#
PAYER_NAME = #record.payerName:VARCHAR#
PAYER_LOGINNAME = #record.payerLoginName:VARCHAR#
PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #record.payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#
PAYER_MEMBERTYPE = #record.payerMemberType:DECIMAL#
PAYER_ACCTCODE = #record.payerAcctCode:VARCHAR#
PAYER_ACCTTYPE = #record.payerAcctType:DECIMAL#
PAYEE_NAME = #record.payeeName:VARCHAR#
PAYEE_LOGINNAME = #record.payeeLoginName:VARCHAR#
PAYEE_MEMBERCODE = #record.payeeMemberCode:DECIMAL#
PAYEE_MEMBERTYPE = #record.payeeMemberType:DECIMAL#
PAYEE_ACCTCODE = #record.payeeAcctCode:VARCHAR#
PAYEE_ACCTTYPE = #record.payeeAcctType:DECIMAL#
PAYMENT_REASON = #record.paymentReason:VARCHAR#
FAILED_REASON = #record.failedReason:VARCHAR#
CREATE_DATE = #record.createDate:TIMESTAMP#
UPDATE_DATE = #record.updateDate:TIMESTAMP#
TRADE_ALIAS = #record.tradeAlias:VARCHAR#
TRADE_TYPE = #record.tradeType:DECIMAL#
FOREIGN_ORDERID = #record.foreignOrderId:VARCHAR#
PARENT_ORDERID = #record.parentOrderId:DECIMAL#

update FO.PAY_TOACCTORDER set ORDER_ID = #record.orderId:DECIMAL#, ORDER_TYPE = #record.orderType:DECIMAL#, ORDER_SMALLTYPE = #record.orderSmallType:VARCHAR#, ORDER_STATUS = #record.orderStatus:DECIMAL#, ORDER_AMOUNT = #record.orderAmount:DECIMAL#, PAYER_NAME = #record.payerName:VARCHAR#, PAYER_LOGINNAME = #record.payerLoginName:VARCHAR#, PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #record.payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#, PAYER_MEMBERTYPE = #record.payerMemberType:DECIMAL#, PAYER_ACCTCODE = #record.payerAcctCode:VARCHAR#, PAYER_ACCTTYPE = #record.payerAcctType:DECIMAL#, PAYEE_NAME = #record.payeeName:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_LOGINNAME = #record.payeeLoginName:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_MEMBERCODE = #record.payeeMemberCode:DECIMAL#, PAYEE_MEMBERTYPE = #record.payeeMemberType:DECIMAL#, PAYEE_ACCTCODE = #record.payeeAcctCode:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_ACCTTYPE = #record.payeeAcctType:DECIMAL#, PAYMENT_REASON = #record.paymentReason:VARCHAR#, FAILED_REASON = #record.failedReason:VARCHAR#, CREATE_DATE = #record.createDate:TIMESTAMP#, UPDATE_DATE = #record.updateDate:TIMESTAMP#, TRADE_ALIAS = #record.tradeAlias:VARCHAR#, TRADE_TYPE = #record.tradeType:DECIMAL#, FOREIGN_ORDERID = #record.foreignOrderId:VARCHAR#, PARENT_ORDERID = #record.parentOrderId:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT NVL(SUM(ORDER_AMOUNT),0) FROM FO.PAY_TOACCTORDER T WHERE T.PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#
T.ORDER_TYPE = #orderType:DECIMAL#
AND T.CREATE_DATE > TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND (T.ORDER_STATUS = 101 OR T.ORDER_STATUS = 111)

SELECT NVL(SUM(ORDER_AMOUNT),0) FROM FO.PAY_TOACCTORDER T WHERE T.PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#
T.ORDER_TYPE = #orderType:DECIMAL#
AND T.CREATE_DATE > TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-MM'), 'yyyy-MM') AND (T.ORDER_STATUS = 101 OR T.ORDER_STATUS = 111)

SELECT NVL(COUNT(1),0) FROM FO.PAY_TOACCTORDER T WHERE T.PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#
T.ORDER_TYPE = #orderType:DECIMAL#
AND T.CREATE_DATE > TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND (T.ORDER_STATUS = 101 OR T.ORDER_STATUS = 111)

SELECT NVL(COUNT(1),0) FROM FO.PAY_TOACCTORDER T WHERE T.PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#
T.ORDER_TYPE = #orderType:DECIMAL#
AND T.CREATE_DATE > TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-MM'), 'yyyy-MM') AND (T.ORDER_STATUS = 101 OR T.ORDER_STATUS = 111)
